title: How to show Outlook calendar events on the "At A Glance" widget?
content:
Hi,
I use Outlook.com for my personal and work email. How can I set the "At A Glance" widget to show events from the Outlook calendar? I tried to add my outlook.com email address in Gmail, without solving the problem.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
